website_summaries.verdict: Affordable consumer grade model with professional level performance. Also performs other ice and food processing duties.
pros: More affordable than renting a commercial ice shaver for small parties
Can process any form of ice

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different, plastic ice shaver on Amazon and it lasted exactly 4 months before the motor ran out. I wish I had seen this earlier. Even though it is more expensive than the other one, It is well worth the price. As a person who loves to eat shaved ice plain, I use this several times a day. The remaining ice that gets caught inside does melt and leaves small puddles but I have found a solution (see picture). I just took an inexpensive pan that I bought at Walmart and set the machine inside. At the end of the day I dump out the small amount of water and wipe dry. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gemqueen

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy another one!!
customer_reviews.text: Best money I've ever spent!! Comes out like "snow" not slush and I use my ice straight from my freezer. We use this multiple times a day! The only complaint I would have is the left over ice in the machine melts and ends up all over but I just add a towel underneath the machine or sometimes clean out the ice and problem solved. But it is nothing that would stop me from purchasing again... I actually plan on buying another one for my parents for a bday present :-)
customer_reviews.author: TNap

customer_reviews.title: but it is just water and it can be easily cleaned with a rag
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It shaves is quickly and uniformly. Water does tend to spray a bit, but it is just water and it can be easily cleaned with a rag. My kids love icees on a hot day (which we get more than our fair share of) and I like that I can control the amount of sugar added to their treats. My husband and I like to make adult icees for our guests and us to enjoy poolside. Looking at the cost of renting an ice shaver for a party, it's worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It makes finer shavings of ice if you can use a block ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes finer shavings of ice if you can use a block of ice shaped like the tube. We have small bowls that work. It is fast and powerful. Definitely heavy duty. Any ice left in the machine melts and doesn't go into the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good just one small thing to fix.
customer_reviews.text: We use when its super backed up from other slower shave ice machine, this is more of a snow cone constancy we use for slushies, get product and has hold up really well, only thing that the hopper doesnt close all the way so ice melts and doesnt get caught in the bowl it just runs down the side of the machine, so it puddles under the machine after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for making sno-cones. I thought by using the word shaver machine that it was a shaved ice machine. It is not. But my family and I have enjoyed so many sno-cones. I found a metal shaving inside one of my ice cups and haven't had any issues since. For fast sno-cones at home this item is good. When you start the process it is necessary to move the bowl in a circular motion so the ice does not clump up in one area.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Grinds ice, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more shaved ice, this machine grinds it leaving ice nuggets. It is easy to use and makes a fair amount of ice quickly. It does leak a lot of water though. I set it up on a drainer mat over the sink, solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: noeau

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Received on time, nice box. Prefect for small parties. Used ice cubes. Easy to use, turn on power, put ice in and pull handle down. Easy to clean, just wipe down and store. I got this at a discount for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle M Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Small enough to move around easily. Very quick to use. I did have to use a little bit more pressure then I expected to shave the ice. Also I was hopping the ice would shave a bit thinner. Some of the ice was more like chunks. Overall great product. Would’ve gave 5 stars if the ice would shave more into a fluff and not chunks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this ice shaver until I found metal shavings in ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this ice shaver until I found metal shavings in my ice. I tried shaving ice several times to make sure that it was really metal that I was seeing. It shaves Ice quickly and the ice is very fine and snow like, but unfortunately I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and shaved ice to snow-like...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Shaved ice better than the ice cones from the popular truck vendor according to my grandkids... it was a definite hit of the party! Very heavy and substantial metal with all the safety precautions you would want in an ice shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Hood

customer_reviews.title: Best ice shaver ever!
customer_reviews.text: Such a handy little ice shaver! My grandchildren loved it and I am even giving one to them as a gift. Only two questions: Really slice fruit and vegetables? If so, how do you clean it? Aside from that, I am loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Stable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice footprint on the counter gives security when using, which given the blade is a major plus!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty noisy, so we keep it in another room ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this to make sno-cones to sell at school events. It's pretty noisy, so we keep it in another room and shave ice as we need it. But it's fast, and the ice it makes is nice and snowy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice machine, had sno-cone shaved ice in seconds, very happy with purchase............
customer_reviews.author: Grant Kettler

customer_reviews.title: Industrial
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with the kids. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Ann Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Works well for ice from Our freezer. Very easy to use, comes out very thin and fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sidwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shaves ice super fine- perfect for sno cones! It is a little messy but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I'm In Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new ice shaver! It works perfectly, even adults go crazy for it! LOL
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysShopping954

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine for my Concession stand. It made great snow cones.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it is a hit at all party's
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal for this price. I love it and it is a hit at all party's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked good. you will need a catch pan underneath as ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a machine that appeared to have been damaged. I tried it out and aside from the obvious damage it had, it worked good. you will need a catch pan underneath as water will leak out and make a mess and the dish to catch the ice is way too shallow for it's purpose and again... you will make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Rico

customer_reviews.title: Quick , fairly priced ,well built.
customer_reviews.text: One great ice shaver! Just about enjoy flavored ice every day. Thanks you.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just love it, however, the price is higher than what my friend paid for hers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it might fall off
customer_reviews.text: The motor is lose. Looks like it might fall off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Fast, super easy, almost nothing to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it we’re enjoying some milk shakes esp this summer 😊
customer_reviews.author: Toni Grace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was perfect for my grandsons birthday party to make all his friends and adults sno cones.
customer_reviews.author: KERRIE FISH

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's loud, but it works!!! Finely shaved Ice in an instant and it uses ice cubes! Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected something so so but was pleasantly surprised how ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected something so so but was pleasantly surprised how fast and how well it worked. I will be buying one for my employees also!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hrib

customer_reviews.title: Too crunchy
customer_reviews.text: The ice is not as fluffy as people say. It starts out that way. But moving it to a cup. Then adding the flavors. It turns crunchier.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Kolbe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good product, completely fill my expectations, i will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: noe lopez

customer_reviews.title: Poor excuse for a product you should be ashamed and pulled of the market
customer_reviews.text: Lots of trouble with this unit I started it up it started smoking and melted all the plastic down had to use fire extinguishers on it never got to use it once scared my wife and I to death never again an neather should anybody else buy this product un less you want to die
customer_reviews.author: Santaman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. Just a few minor improvements it would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much in love with this, aside from the fact that there's always a little bit of ice that remains in the bottom and if you're in a rush or you forget to scoop it out it leaks out the bottom all over the counter. I also wish it was raised a little bit to be able to put a different Bowl underneath or a cup even. I knew it was low though so that's not why I gave it four stars four stars is only because of the fact that it leaks
customer_reviews.author: Little Miss Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: My coworkers and I all chipped in to get this. We work outside in extreme heat and needed something nice to help cool off. It is used every day and so far has payed itself off.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Vine

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. We ordered the same model off of eBay for about $20 less but it arrived with bad packaging and basically destroyed. Paid the extra money on Amazon and got a well packaged and fully functioning device. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works like a pro. We've made snocones everyday since getting this and can't wait to use it this summer too. So glad we got this, really great price for how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The price is great.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. We use it daily. It does get wet around it (a small amount) we just wipe the counter when done. The price is great.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great for those hot summer days!
customer_reviews.text: Great treat in the summer.....my grandchildren LOVE it!! Can be a little messy...but hey....it's just water!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: works great..
customer_reviews.text: Buy this ice machine for my business.... works great... Make very fine ice for my Sashimi!
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty machine. Only complaint is it drips a lot while grinding but very happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: 4kidsWFB

customer_reviews.title: i would not recommend this
customer_reviews.text: broke in less than 5 weeks of use.. i would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Gordbeam

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent shaved ice... you get half shaved ...
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent shaved ice... you get half shaved ice (power) and half snow cone ice ( crushed ice). If you're making snow cones I would look at another machine.
customer_reviews.author: ALK16

product_meta.title: Flexzion Commercial Ice Shaver Machine 143 lbs 180W Sno Snow Cone Maker Shaved Electric Stainless Steel Blade Icee Crusher Hand Push Slice Fruit Vegetable for Party Restaurant Home Use
product_meta.description:
The small and efficient unit is ideal for making slushies and frozen drinks for your business, restaurant, school organizations, festival, and perfect for at home use as well! Great for those long days of summer when you want to cool down and enjoy a cold beverage or snack. It's very easy to use, simply put ice into the crusher and push the handle. Then enjoy a delicious slush drink, snow cone, or a mixed drink.


Specification:

 * Material: plastic shell and aluminium hopper
 * Diameter of the hopper: 108mm
 * Rotated Speed: 1400 runs/min
 * Shaving Capacity: 143 lbs/h ( 65kg/h )
 * Voltage: 110V, 220V
 * Frequency: 50Hz/60Hz
 * Power: 180W
 * Frequency: 60Hz

Package Content:

 * 1x Ice Shaver Machine Snow Cone Maker Shaved Icee Hand Push Party Restaurant Home
feature_bullets: Highly efficient motor can produce 143 lbs of shaved ice per hour to meet demands of large amount of ice in a relatively short time
Stainless steel shaving blade for higher shaving speed
The power cuts off automatically when the hopper is opened
Stable and heavy base; Sleek eye-catching shape is perfect to keep on a tabletop
Low maintenance very simple and convenient to operate

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
